item.title: Small fridge/kitchen unit fly tipped on pavement, 16th October
item.description:
On the pavement outside the Park Court buildings, a small kitchen unit (looks like a fridge) has been dumped and left on the street. It was reported at around 7am this morning, so possibly left at some point last night (15/10/25).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crystal Palace, London
Report on FixMyStreet
